alert.note: Alert for Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland; North Snowy Range Foothills; Southwest Carbon County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 31 at 1:20AM MDT until August 31 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning Thursday afternoon for zones 417, 418, 423, and 427... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR HOT, DRY, AND BREEZY CONDITIONS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 417, 418, 423, AND 427... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...In east-central Wyoming Fire Zones 417 and 418. In southeast Wyoming Fire Zone 423 and 427. * WIND...West at 15 to 25 MPH with gusts up to 30 MPH. * HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Middle North Platte River Basin, Niobrara and Converse High Plains; Niobrara, Lower Elevations of Converse, Thunder Basin National Grassland; North Snowy Range Foothills; Southwest Carbon County
